heading: HR00916
0:
A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION AND THE COMMISSION ON HIGHER EDUCATION TO POSTPONE THE OPENING OF CLASSES UNTIL THERE IS AN ESTABLISHED FRAMEWORK AND CLEAR GUIDELINES FOR AN ALTERNATIVE
LEARNING SYSTEM DURING THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC
status: Pending with the Committee on DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE since 2020-05-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00916
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION AND THE COMMISSION ON HIGHER EDUCATION TO POSTPONE THE OPENING OF CLASSES UNTIL THERE IS AN ESTABLISHED FRAMEWORK AND CLEAR GUIDELINES FOR AN ALTERNATIVE LEARNING SYSTEM DURING THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
